Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lisbon \Lis"bon\ (l[i^]z"b[o^]n), n. A sweet, light-colored species of wine, produced in the province of Estremadura, and so called as being shipped from Lisbon, in Portugal. [1913 Webster]

Lisbon n : capital and largest city and economic and cultural center of Portugal; a major port in western Portugal on Tagus River where it broadens and empties into the Atlantic [syn: {Lisboa}, {capital of Portugal}]
